creator: Nicolas Lehovetzki
descriptionHtml:
The leading maths games in Europe now available for Android !

AB Maths lite is a set of cool mental math games for kids from 5 to 10 :
- Maths drills
- 1 level of difficulty (4 levels in the full version)
- Clean, simple and attractive interface
- Many game options that the children can choose by themselves
- Various fun game modes, including the bubble game
- Follow up of the results of several players

Parents can follow the progress of their children.
The player can practice his maths facts with or without a timer.

This app is a fun way for your children to practice math worksheets. Kids play with numbers and don’t feel like their are working at all.

The bubble game also strengthens sequential abilities, mental manipulation, attention and fine motor skills.

More fun than traditional math flash cards, kids love it and enjoy learning mathematics. These cool math games will help your child be first in math !

These arithmetic exercises are suitable for the following levels : 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th grade, all k12 levels, primary and elementary.

This application is suitable for all ages, parents can train their brain in a effective way. We receive many feedbacks from parents or grandparents who enjoy to compete with their children over multiplications.

If you like the app, please leave a review, it helps us a lot.
Your feedback is also very welcome.

This app is designed for smartphones and tablets, HD graphics are optimised for the latest generation tablets.

We design cool educational apps for children, with a focus on simplicity and fun. Check out our other applications in the store.
Our apps are also widely used at school. We are proud of our contribution to modern education.
Educators, don’t hesitate to send us feedback through our email.

If you like the app, please leave a review, it helps us a lot.
Your feedback is also very welcome.

Have fun !
descriptionShort: Fun mental maths games for kids from 5 to 10 : multiplications, times tables

title: Maths games for kids - lite

container.value: 35 rue Joseph de Maistre. 75018 PARIS FRANCE

creator: Nicolas Lehovetzki
descriptionHtml:
AB Maths is one of the leading maths games in Europe, now available for Android!

Key Features:


- Times Tables Training: Engage your child in fun and interactive times tables practice, making learning times tables an enjoyable experience.
- Mental Maths Drills: Enhance maths facts with additions, subtractions, multiplications, and divisions through various maths games.
- 1 Level of Difficulty (4 levels in the full version): Gradually increase the challenge as your child progresses in these engaging maths games.
- Clean, Simple, and Attractive Interface: Easy to navigate and visually appealing, perfect for kids to enjoy educational games.
- Multiple Game Options: Children can choose from various fun maths games, including the popular bubble game that focuses on times tables and other maths skills.
- Follow-Up of Results: Track the progress of several players, ideal for parents and educators to monitor times tables and maths game performance.
- Timer Option: Practice maths facts with or without a timer to add an extra level of challenge in these mathematics games.

Benefits:


- Times Tables Mastery: Help your child become proficient in times tables through engaging and interactive maths games.
- Develop Sequential Abilities: The bubble games strengthen mental manipulation, attention, and fine motor skills while practicing maths concepts.
- Fun Learning: More enjoyable than traditional maths flash cards, making learning mathematics a delightful experience through these fun maths games.
- Suitable for All Ages: Designed for kids from 5 to 10, but also enjoyable for parents and grandparents who want to compete in multiplications and other maths exercises within these games.

Educational Value:


- Aligned with School Curriculum: Suitable for 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th grade, and all K12 levels, primary and elementary, focusing on essential maths skills.
- Used in Schools: Our maths games are widely used in educational settings, contributing to modern education by making times tables and other mathematics concepts engaging.
- Enhance Maths Skills: These cool maths games will help your child excel in methematics, particularly in times tables, and be first in their class.

Why Choose AB Maths?


- Engaging Maths Games: Kids play with numbers and don’t feel like they are working at all while learning times tables and other maths skills.
- Parental Involvement: Parents can follow the progress of their children and compete in maths games together, focusing on times tables and other maths exercises.
- Feedback Welcome: If you like the app, please leave a review. Your feedback is very welcome as we continue to improve our games.
